title: Loveless
description: Vila Reed doesn't believe in love. Maybe it's because of her stalker ex-boyfriend, her parents' messy divorce or the men who have tried to walk all over her. A young woman full of goals and dreams, Vila tries to stay away from anything that brings her love. When handsome Catcher Valentine walks into her life, Vila is torn between her feelings for Catcher and the feelings creeping up from her past. Will she allow herself to fall for Catcher or talk herself out of everything she feels? This book is for anyone who has been given a reason not to believe in love and relationships.
author: Victoria Reyes
